Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 56th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2016...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/15/2016, off Michael Carrillo (CIN)...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 9/16/2017.
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 4/7/2018.
Traded from Houston to Montreal on 5/26/2018 (Going to HOU: P Dwayne Brewington, 3B Joaquin Depaz. Going to MON: P Daniel Thomas, P Beau Bodine, CF Robert Hubbert, 3B Timothy Myers)...
Released by Montreal on 4/11/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/1/2020 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/27/2020 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 8-9 weeks...
